nl.inl.blacklab.search.sequences

Class SpansInBucketsPerDocumentSorted

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.sequences.SpansInBucketsPerDocument
      • nl.inl.blacklab.search.sequences.SpansInBucketsPerDocumentSorted
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpansInBuckets

    public class SpansInBucketsPerDocumentSorted
extends SpansInBucketsPerDocument
    Wrap a Spans to retrieve hits per document, so we can process all matches in a document efficiently. Hits are sorted by the given comparator.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface nl.inl.blacklab.search.sequences.SpansInBuckets

      • skipTo

        public boolean skipTo(int target)
               throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: SpansInBuckets
        Skip to specified document id. NOTE: if we're already at the target document, don't advance. This differs from how Spans.skipTo() is defined, which always advances at least one hit.
        Specified by:
        skipTo in interface SpansInBuckets
        Parameters:
        target - document id to skip to
        Returns:
        true if we're at a valid group, false if we're done
        Throws:
        IOException
